name: horny
content:
horny adjective
(SEXUAL)
Add to word list
Add to word list
informal sexually excited: feel horny She'd had a couple of drinks and was feeling horny.
UK informal sexually attractive: You look horny in that skirt.
horny adjective
(HARD)
made of a hard substance, like horn: Birds have horny beaks.
(especially of skin) hard and rough
